Events.OnCreate:
(block ( (playerLevel (korGetPlayerLevel)) (destList Nil) dockedFreighters freighterObj destEntry ) ; Filter down to the list of freighters that the player is ; qualified to escort (and that she hasn't already declined) (setq dockedFreighters (filter (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "sHZ O:docked; +commonwealth; +freighter;") theFreighter (and (not (objGetObjRefData theFreighter "korolovDest")) (not (objGetData theFreighter "korolovPlayerEscort")) (geq playerLevel (objGetStaticData theFreighter "korolovMinLevel")) (geq (shpGetMaxSpeed theFreighter) 12) ; Mission is boring with a slow ship ) ) )
; Must be an easier way of doing this ; Not using sysGetStargates as we want to avoid uncharted gates. ; NOTE - no way to check if destination station has been destroyed (setq destList (apply append (map (map (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "G -uncharted;") gateObj (sysGetStargateDestinationNode (objGetStargateID gateObj)) ) nodeID (unvFindObj nodeID "t +friendly; +populated; +majorStation; -uncharted; -battleArena;") ) )) (switch ; Finite number of missions per station (ls (objGetData aOwnerObj 'remainingMissions) 1) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Only offer to Journeyman and above (not (find '(2 3) playerLevel)) (msnDestroy gSource)
; No missions once the stronghold is destroyed (objIsAbandoned (objGetObjRefData aOwnerObj 'charonStronghold)) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Pick a random freighter. If we can't find one there is no mission (not (setq freighterObj (random dockedFreighters))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Pick a random destination. If we can't find one there is no mission (not (setq destEntry (random destList))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Otherwise setup mission (block ( pricePerContainer cargoValue escortRate escortFee ) ; Figure out the price per container of the cargo (This depends on the freighter class) (setq pricePerContainer (eval (objGetStaticData freighterObj "korolovContainerPrice"))) (if (leq pricePerContainer 0) (setq pricePerContainer 200))
; Load the freighter with cargo (korEmptyFreighter freighterObj) (setq cargoValue (korFillFreighter freighterObj pricePerContainer))
; Compute the fee that we will pay for escort based on the value of the ; cargo and the rate that the freighter will pay (setq escortRate (objGetStaticData freighterObj "korolovEscortRate")) (if (or (not escortRate) (= escortRate 0)) (setq escortRate 100)) (setq escortFee (/ (* escortRate cargoValue) 10000))
; Double fee for travelling to another system (setq escortFee (* escortFee 2))
; Adjust the fee randomly and round down to the nearest 50 (setq escortFee (intRoundDown (/ (* escortFee (random 75 125)) 100) 50 ) ) ; Mission settings (msnSetData gSource 'freighterID (objGetID freighterObj)) ; Remember the destination station (msnSetData gSource 'destID (@ destEntry 0)) (msnSetData gSource 'destNodeID (@ destEntry 2)) (msnSetData gSource 'destName (fmtNoun (@ destEntry 3) (@ destEntry 4) 1 0x04)) (msnSetData gSource 'srcID (objGetID aOwnerObj)) (msnSetData gSource 'srcNodeID (sysGetNode))
(msnSetData gSource 'escortType (objGetType freighterObj)) (msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 125) (msnSetData gSource 'cargoValue cargoValue) (msnSetData gSource 'reward escortFee) ) ) )
Events.OnAcceptedUndock:
(block ( (freighterObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID))) ) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource gPlayerShip) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource freighterObj) (objSetObjRefData freighterObj "korolovDest" Nil) (objSetData freighterObj "korolovPlayerEscort" True)
; Order the freighter (shpSetAISetting freighterObj 'ascendOnGate True) (msnSetData gSource 'navID (msnGetData gSource 'destID)) (msnSetData gSource 'navNodeID (msnGetData gSource 'destNodeID)) (msnFireEvent gSource 'OrderFreighter)
(objSendMessage gPlayerShip freighterObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgBeginEscort)) (objSetIdentified freighterObj)
; Order the pirates (chrRaidTransport freighterObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID)) (sysGetStargateLeadingToNode (msnGetData gSource 'destNodeID)) (msnGetData gSource 'cargoValue) ) ; And set flag for raid when entering dest system (msnSetData gSource 'triggerAttack True) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget: (if (msnGetData gSource 'gateTarget) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateTarget))) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) 'escort) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed: (switch (= aDestroyReason 'enteredStargate) Nil ; If the ship dies, mission fails (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'playerDestroyedFreighter (and gPlayerShip (= aOrderGiver gPlayerShip))) (msnFailure gSource) ) )
Events.OnObjDocked: (switch ; Halfway point. Wait a bit, then head back (and (= (objGetID aObjDocked) (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) (= (objGetID aDockTarget) (msnGetData gSource 'destID)) ) (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'navID (msnGetData gSource 'srcID)) (msnSetData gSource 'navNodeID (msnGetData gSource 'srcNodeID)) (sysAddObjTimerEvent 90 gSource 'OrderFreighter) ) ; If freighter has made it back to the starting Korolov then mission is successful (and (= (objGetID aObjDocked) (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) (= (objGetID aDockTarget) (msnGetData gSource 'srcID)) ) (block Nil (objSetData aObjDocked "korolovPlayerEscort" Nil) (msnSuccess gSource) ) )
Events.OnObjEnteredGate:
(switch ; No aDestNodeID means this is probably an asension event (= aDestNodeID "") Nil
; Freigher is entering gate (= (objGetID aObj) (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) (block Nil ; Record where we've come from and are going to (msnSetData gSource 'lastNode (sysGetNode)) (msnSetData gSource 'nextNode aDestNodeID) ; Time we entered the gate so we can workout where to position on the otherside (msnSetData gSource 'gateTime (unvGetTick)) (msnSetData gSource 'gateDist Nil) (msnSetData gSource 'freighterAscended True) ; Point the player towards the gate (msnSetData gSource 'gateTarget (objGetID aGateObj)) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
(and gPlayerShip (= aObj gPlayerShip)) (block (freighterObj) (switch ; Don't do anything if the freighter is not in the system (not (setq freighterObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)))) Nil
; If we took the wrong gate then fail mission (!= aDestNodeID (msnGetData gSource 'navNodeID)) ; Could use gateTime to record when we abandoned the freighter... (msnFailure gSource)
; Freighter has already jumped ahead of us (msnGetData gSource 'freighterAscended) (dbgOutput "player following freighter")
; If player abandons the freigher while it is under attack then fail (objGetProperty freighterObj 'underAttack) (msnFailure gSource)
; Or if there were enemies near by ; (sysFindObject freighterObj "sEN:100;") ; (msnFailure gSource)
; (ls (objGetDistance freighterObj aGateObj) 50) (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'lastNode (sysGetNode)) (msnSetData gSource 'nextNode aDestNodeID) (msnSetData gSource 'gateTime Nil) (msnSetData gSource 'gateDist (objGetDistance freighterObj aObj)) (msnSetData gSource 'ascendFlag True) ) ) ) )
Events.OnGlobalSystemStarted: ; Using OnGlobalSystemStarted so we can place the descended freighter ; before the player arrives. If we use standard events e.g. OnPlayerEnteredSystem ; then the freighter will appear as the player does - i.e. a few moments after the ; game starts displaying the system. ; ; We enum over all the active copies of this mission to simulate an OnSystemStarted event (enum (msnFind "a +unid:&msKorolovLongEscort;;") missionObj (switch ; If we're in the wrong place then don't do anything (!= (sysGetNode) (msnGetData missionObj 'nextNode)) Nil ; If we don't have an ascended freighter we can't do anything (not (msnGetData missionObj 'freighterAscended)) Nil ; Nothing to do if the freighter came through after the player (not (msnGetData missionObj 'gateTime)) Nil ; Work out where the freigher is heading next and create it a short ; distance towards its destination. (block ( (destObj (if (= (sysGetNode) (msnGetData missionObj 'navNodeID)) (objGetObjByID (msnGetData missionObj 'navID)) (sysGetStargateLeadingToNode (msnGetData missionObj 'navNodeID)) ) ) (gateObj (sysGetStargateLeadingToNode (msnGetData missionObj 'lastNode))) (freighterObj (sysDescendObject (msnGetData missionObj 'freighterID) gateObj)) (angle (sysVectorAngle (sysVectorSubtract destObj gateObj))) (maxdist (/ (objGetDistance gateObj destObj) 4)) (dist (/ (- (unvGetTick) (msnGetData missionObj 'gateTime)) 5)) ) ; Still need to limit distance travelled. If the player waits long enough ; then the freighter could overshoot destination (dbgOutput "gate: " gateObj " : " (objGetID gateObj)) (dbgOutput "frgt: " freighterObj " " (objGetName freighterObj)) (dbgOutput "angle: " angle " dist: " dist " maxdist: " maxdist ) (msnSetData missionObj 'gateTarget Nil) (msnSetData missionObj 'freighterAscended Nil) (objSetPos freighterObj (sysVectorPolarOffset gateObj angle dist) angle) ; And order the freigher to start travelling (msnFireEvent missionObj 'OrderFreighter) ) ) )
Events.OnGlobalSystemStopped: ; As with OnGlobalSystemStarted, we don't want to remove the freighter until ; the last minute, otherwise the player will notice it disappear while the gate ; animation is playing (enum (msnFind "a +unid:&msKorolovLongEscort;;") missionObj (if (msnGetData missionObj 'ascendFlag) (block (freighterObj) (setq freighterObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData missionObj 'freighterID))) (sysAscendObject freighterObj) (msnSetData missionObj 'freighterAscended True) (msnSetData missionObj 'ascendFlag Nil) ) ) )
Events.OnPlayerEnteredSystem:
(switch ; No ascended freighter to worry about (not (msnGetData gSource 'freighterAscended)) Nil
; Freighter is not descending to this system (player has wandered elsewhere) (!= (msnGetData gSource 'nextNode) (sysGetNode)) Nil
; Freighter is already here (msnGetData gSource 'gateTime) Nil
; Player went through gate ahead of freighter. So descend it after a suitable delay (msnGetData gSource 'gateDist) (block Nil (dbgOutput "frieghter following at distance: " (msnGetData gSource 'gateDist)) (sysAddObjTimerEvent 90 gSource "OnFreighterArrives") )
; Something has gone wrong (dbgOutput "unexpected outcome") )
Events.OnFreighterArrives: (block ( (gateObj (sysGetStargateLeadingToNode (msnGetData gSource 'lastNode))) (freighterObj (sysDescendObject (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID) gateObj)) ) ; Suspend/resume to trigger a gate effect (objSuspend freighterObj) (objResume freighterObj gateObj) ; Housekeeping (msnSetData gSource 'freighterAscended Nil) ; Order the freighter (msnFireEvent gSource 'OrderFreighter) ; And refresh the target (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
